taskbody.prereq: The following steps assume that you have a domain model file in your project.

step.cmd: In the Project Explorer view pane, click the package in which you want to create a new domain model file.
Right-click the package and select New Domain .
step.stepresult: The New Domain dialog is displayed.

step.cmd: In the File Name field, type the name of the new domain file. The extension must be ".domain" .
Uncheck the T24 Application Extension Domain if you don't want to create a domain model for local reference in application.

Enter a value in the Domain Name field according to recommendations described in section
